code: tabulator(   data,   options = list(),   elementId = NULL,   readOnly = FALSE,   columnHeaders = NULL,   hide = NULL,   fixedCols = NULL,   stretched = c("all", "last", "none"),   dropDown = list(),   css = NULL,   add_selector_bar = FALSE,   add_select_column = FALSE,   return_select_column = FALSE,   return_select_column_name = "row_select",   columnOrder = NULL,   columns = NULL )

title: Create a Tabulator widget ‚Äî tabulator
text: data data frame matrix, NULL empty table options list Tabulator.js options elementId ID element readOnly boolean whole table, vector column ids names (mixing) columnHeaders Custom column headers hide vector column ids names hide fixedCols vector column ids names, columns fixed first specified ones stretched Stretching mode columns (default: "") dropDown list dropdown options specific columns css Optional path custom CSS file add_selector_bar Boolean add selector bar (default: FALSE) add_select_column Boolean add select column (default: FALSE) return_select_column Boolean include selection status returned data (default: FALSE) return_select_column_name Name returned selection column (default: "row_select") columnOrder character vector specifying desired column order (default: NULL) columns Manual columns setting. set, auto creation skipped.
